channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- Intel(R) Graphics Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- Intel(R) Graphics Driver

item.title: CVE-2020-0506|2024-08-04T06:02:52.198Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Improper initialization in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.29.5077, and 26.20.100.7000 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.
